name: 簡良翰
objective: 內容包括第二定律、各種動力循環以及冷凍循環。
schedule:
Week				Topic (Sections)
1 Review of the First Law, Introduction to the Second law, (Ch. 1 ~ Ch. 5, 6.1)
2	Thermal Reservoirs (6.1-6.2)
Heat engines 	(6.3) 
Refrigerators, Heat Pumps, Perpetual-Motion Machines (6.4-6.5)

3	Reversible & Irreversible Processes, Carnot cycle	 (6.6-6.7)
Carnot Principles, The Thermodynamic Temperature Scale	(6.8-6.9)			

4	Carnot Heat Engine	 (6.10)
Carnot Refrigerator and Heat Pump (6.11)

5	Entropy 	(7.1)
	The Increase of Entropy Principle	(7.2)

6	Entropy Change of Pure Substance, Isentropic Processes (7.3-7.4 )
 	Property Diagrams Involving Entropy, What Is Entropy (7.5-7.6)
 	
7	T ds Relations, Entropy Change of Liquids and Solids	(7.7-7.8)
	Entropy change of Ideal Gases (7.9)
 	Reversible Steady-Flow Work, Compressor work (7.10-7.11)
 	
8	Isentropic Efficiencies of Steady-Flow Devices	(7.12)
Entropy Balance	(7.13)

9	Midterm Exam

10	Exergy, Reversible Work, Irreversibility, Second-Law Eff.	(8.1-8.3)
	Exergy Change of a System	(8.4)

11	Exergy Transfer by Heat, Work, and Mass	(8.5)
	The Decrease of Exergy Principle and Exergy Destruction	(8.6)

12	Exergy Balance: Closed System	(8.7)
Exergy Balance: Control Volumes		(8.8)

13	Basic Considerations in the Analysis of Power Cycles	(9.1)
An Overview of Reciprocating Engines		(9.4)

14	Otto Cycle: The Ideal Cycle for Spark-Ignition Engines	(9.5)
Rankine Cycle: The Ideal Cycle for Vapor Power Cycles	(10.2)

15	Deviation of Actual Vapor Power Cycles From Idealized Ones	(10.3)
Refrigerators & Heat Pumps, Reversed Carnot Cycle		(11.1-11.2)

16	Ideal Refrigeration cycle		(11.3)
Actual Vapor-Compression Refrigeration Cycle	(11.4)
  	
17	Advanced Refrigeration Topics	(11.5-11.9)
	Review

18 	Final Exam
scorePolicy: 作業及小考：40% + 期中考：30% + 期末考：30%
